title: Your anger invigorates me
body:
If you think abusing me, or someone else is going to ruin their day, you're wrong :)

Just remember, boos from the crowd is just an applause from ghosts.


Context: Last game we lost, this player felt really angry and upset and felt that he had the right to blame everyone else.. (this isn't even ranked lol)
